graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsGetKeyValues (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		key
		type
		value
		isActive
		description
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsFindKeyValue (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		key
		type
		value
		isActive
		description
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	toolsFindKeyValueById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		key
		type
		value
		isActive
		description
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:ToolsUpdateKeyValueInput!)
{
	toolsUpdateKeyValue (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		key
		type
		value
		isActive
		description
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	toolsDeleteKeyValueById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		key
		type
		value
		isActive
		description
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsDeleteKeyValues (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		key
		type
		value
		isActive
		description
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
